#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t;
    cin >> t;
    char s1[1001];
    char s2[1001];
    int l1,l2;
    while(t--){
        cin >> s1 >>s2;
        l1 = strlen(s1);
        l2 = strlen(s2);
        int i,cnt;
        if ( l1 != l2)
        {
            cout << "-1\n";
        }
        else{
            cnt =0;
            for ( i=0;i<l1;i++)
            {

                if ( s1[i]!=s2[i])
                {
                    cnt++;
                }
            }
            cout << cnt <<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
